Caption: The delegates at the Third Institute Day conversing over tea
Description: The Third Institute Day took place at the Institute’s Building Sciences Block on the IITM campus. The chief guest for the event was Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications). The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. A number of students, faculty and dignitaries were present at the event. Prizes were awarded to students, faculty and alumni as well. Before the commencement of the event there were refreshment served for the delegates. In the image from left: A gentleman who hasn’t been identified as yet, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication), Mr. Gerhard Fischer (Consul for Germany in South India) and Dr. Werner Koch
